text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Iraqi press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Saddam Hussein receives well-wishers on the ninth anniversary of the Great Victory Day -- the end of 1980-88 Iraq-Iran war.
- A UAE paper calls for an Arab summit with the presence of Iraq.
- Saddam receives congratulations on Victory Day from senior ruling Baath party and state officials.
(The above were also carried by JUMHOURIAY and QADISSIYA)
